names.pinyin: shang zhong xia tong yong tong feng wan
names.english: pill to treat painful wind anywhere
names.commonEnglish: Pill to Treat Painful Wind Anywhere
aka: Upper, Middle and Lower General Pill for Wind-Pain

actions: Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao, drains Kidney Fire and treats Blood Stagnation with Heat.
With Cang Zhu, eliminates Dampness and clears Heat for Lower Jiao Damp-Heat with pain, swelling and weakness in the lower limbs.
Strongly dries Dampness, tonifies the Spleen and clears Dampness from the Lower Jiao.
With Chuan Xiong, Bai Zhi and Qiang Huo, for Exterior Wind-Cold-Dampness.
With Huang Bai, for pain, swelling, and weakness of the lower extremities or skin lesions due to Wind-Dampness.
Dries Dampness and expels Phlegm.
With Cang Zhu, for Wind-Damp painful obstruction.
Reduces Food Stagnation, promotes digestion, moves Qi and harmonizes the Stomach.
Activates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, expels Wind and alleviates pain.
With Gui Zhi, expels Wind-Dampness, warms the channels and collaterals, facilitates joint movement and relieves Bi pain for joint and limb pain due to an External Wind-Cold invasion.
Breaks up Blood Stasis and activates Blood circulation.
With Hong Hua, activates the Blood for all types of Blood Stagnation.
Drains Damp-Heat from the Liver and Gallbladder channels.
Promotes urination, reduces edema especially in the lower body, expels Wind-Dampness, alleviates pain and purges Damp-Heat.
Expels Wind, expels Dampness, alleviates discharge and treats leukorrhea and diarrhea.
With Qiang Huo, Gui Zhi and Chuan Xiong, for muscle aches and pains due to Wind-Dampness.
Releases the Exterior, disperses Cold, expels Wind-Cold-Dampness, unblocks painful obstruction and alleviates pain.
With Chuan Xiong, for headaches and generalized body aches and pains associated with the common cold or painful obstruction.
With Cang Zhu, for a heavy-headed sensation.
Disperses Cold and unblocks the collaterals and is used for both mobile painful obstruction due to Wind and intensely painful obstruction due to Cold.
With Qiang Huo, for Wind-Damp Bi causing joint pain.
Releases the Exterior, assists Yang, adjusts the Ying and Wei, warms the channels and collaterals to relieve pain, unblocks Yang and transforms Qi and thin mucus.
Activates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels, unblocks menstruation and alleviates pain.
With Chuan Xiong, for chest and abdominal pain due to Qi and Blood Stasis.
Clears Heat
Dries Dampness
Activates the Blood
Dispels Wind

symptoms: The pain moves from joint to joint

contraindications: Do not use for the debilitated without modifications.

modifications.purpose: red, hot swollen joints with intense Heat
Bi syndrome caused by Blood Deficiency
